Articles.Content:
Hey guys! My name's Snowtiger and I recently joined the KSP forums to post some of my spacecrafts. Currently I have my Hydra SS Fighter Jet and the Mirage SS Fighter Jet (currently being approved).

I work at a local GameStop in my town and I like to play video games and eat Mexican Food.

I'm a amateur at building spacecrafts (only had KSP for couple of weeks).

I'm a fan of BahamutoD and some other KSP players such as SWDennis.

I hope to see some awesome spacecrafts I can get ideas from and then make my own!
Hello and welcome! You should check out the Rocket Builders and Spacecraft Exchange if you want to get inspired, or to try other people's craft. You can also click my sig.
Welcome aboard! I look forward to seeing your craft!
Welcome aboard! I'd hoped to work at a GameStop too, but now I'm just trying to find anything with a paycheck!
Welcome aboard! Also check out Live from Mission Control for a bunch of excellent video creators!
